summary: The 'TAP Promotion Act' (H.R. 1845) amends Title 10 of the United States Code to include a presentation in the Transition Assistance Program (TAP) that promotes benefits available to veterans under laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs. This presentation, developed in collaboration with veterans service organizations, will be standardized, reviewed, and submitted to relevant congressional committees. The bill also mandates an annual report on the presentation's implementation and participation.
